<DOMAIN>DIGITAL-MEDIA</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER
Core Qualifications
Window XP, Vista, 7.
Program languages: Lisp, HTML, SQL, Macros (VBA).
Software Products/Tools: Microsoft Word, Excel (Pivot table, Vlookup, etc.), Access, PowerPoint, Sharepoint, Salesforce, Google Analytics, IBM Coremetrics and Microstrategy, Infoview, Basecamp, Youtube and Facebook Analytics, Sitespect, SEO (working knowledge).
Others: Statistic, Behavioral Psychology.

EXPERIENCE

Digital Marketing Manager

08/2012 to 01/2016
Company Name
City ,
State
Grew the combined SEM, display, retargeting and affiliate marketing channel by 15% in membership this past year.
Hence an increase of $20 million in life time value.
Launched acquisition and brand awareness marketing campaigns with marketing partners Affiliate, Retargeting, SEM Adwords, Facebook, etc.) that were segmented by market.
Optimized campaigns across different channels by changing/adding keywords, creative, ad grouping, dna/cities, ad copies, bids, landing pages, etc. to lower CPA and increase ROI.
Collaborated with pricing and creative team and marketing partners to create/replace creative that reflect marketing strategies.
Worked with marketing partners to understand & compete with competitors' marketing strategies.
Maintained budgets and negotiated prices/bonuses with new/existing marketing partners.
Exported data from different marketing partners system.
Used advance Excel to dissect data and create dashboards to highlight marketing campaigns (CPA, CPC, CPM).
Used PowerPoint to present KPI, ROI and recommendations to internal teams, executives and marketing partners.
Managed an associate to maintain and optimize campaigns across different channels.
Created A/B and multivariate tests with Sitespect to find landing page/channel/messaging that generate the highest conversion rate.
Consequently increase conversion rate by 10%.
Analyzed web & marketing performance metrics such as CTR, Conversion Rate, purchase funnel conversion rate, LTV, etc. with IBM Coremetric and Google Analytics.
Affiliate Marketing Manager

04/2009 to 07/2012
Company Name
City ,
State
Managed and monitored daily affiliate performance.
Also optimized campaigns often by changing creative, landing pages, offers, etc.
As a result generated 10% increase in revenue.
Negotiated with affiliate networks for optimal cost: base on CPC, CPM, CPA.
Used SiteCatalyst, Omniture to generate daily and weekly reporting & analysis to internal team and external partners.
Researched and built partnerships with new affiliates with high levels of relevant traffic.
Worked with creative team to design creative that is relevant to current events and seasons.
Managed A/B and multivariate tests to find the highest converting landing pages.
Analyzed historic performance with advance Microsoft Excel (Pivot table and Vlookup) Developed new business models such as up selling, redesigning creative and pop ups.
Collaborated with technical teams to resolve reporting, creative or application issues.
Business Intelligent Analyst

07/2006 to 04/2009
Company Name
City ,
State
Worked with multiple teams to increase call by 18% and revenue by 10% in past years.
Used SQL to mine data from multiple databases and tables.
Also gathered data from Salesforce.
Built ad hoc report with Business Object - Infoview to highlight metrics: impressions, searches, clicks, CTR, revenue, etc.
Created a dashboard that collects raw data live without the delay of applying business rules Designed A/B testing to highlight the effects of product enhancements or replacements.
Analyzed the results of A/B testing with advance Excel (Pivot table, Vlookup, etc) and present KPI and forecast to team members and management in PowerPoint.
Identified enhancements in existing online products to increase search relevancy and customer experience, as result increase in click through rate (CTR) & more revenue.
Loan Processor/Analyst

07/2004 to 06/2006
Company Name
City ,
State
Validated and verified loan application information.
Compared application information to Database.
Analyzed supporting documentation on Automated Underwriting System.
Reviewed loan application package for completeness and accuracy.
Reconciled application information against system input, comparing individual data.
Calculated and analyzed debt to income ratio (i.e. employment, tax returns, etc.).
Also funds to close (i.e. verification of deposits, gift money, etc).
Coordinated rigorously with customers, boarding, processing, underwriting, closing, appraisal and escrow teams to close loans.

EDUCATION

Bachelor :
Cognitive Science Computational Modeling
May 2004
University of California
City
Cognitive Science Computational Modeling

SKILLS

ad, budgets, closing, Conversion, CPA, databases, Database, dna, documentation, funds, Google Analytics, HTML, IBM, Lisp, Macros, marketing strategies, marketing, market, messaging, Access, Microsoft Excel, Excel, money, PowerPoint, Sharepoint, Window, Microsoft Word, Microstrategy, networks, Operating systems, page, Pivot table, pricing, Psychology, reporting, selling, SQL, tables, tax returns, Underwriting, Vista, VBA
<RESUME_END>

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Analyst, Transportation Financial Systems

Location: Bellevue, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Description

Transportation Financial Systems (TFS) is one of the largest technological components within the transportation organization enabling the corporation to conduct global trade. These systems are a cornerstone to the success of all global program launches including retail expansions into new geographies and the establishment of new transportation arcs. TFS provides an end-to-end financial solution for all financial transactions including tax integration, financial document creation & management, expense auditing, accounting, payments, and cost allocation functions. We leverage the latest machine learning technologies to develop highly scalable next generation products driving real time financial accounting, reporting, and business insights.

The role will support the development of a best in class financial system enabling the sustainable growth of the Amazon Transportation Network. We are looking for analytical, technically skilled, innovative, hands-on, and customer-obsessed Business Analyst to join our fast-paced dynamic team. The ideal candidate thrives in a fast-paced environment, relishes working with large volumes of data, enjoys the challenge of highly complex business contexts, and, above all else, is a passionate about data and analytics. This role will be pivotal in supporting our product, business, and tech team to meet their challenging goals by providing targeted and actionable insight.

Transportation Financial Systems (TFS) is the largest financial technological component within the organization, enabling global trade. These systems are pivotal to the success of all service offerings, and program launches, including retail expansions into new regions and the establishment of new transportation arcs. TFS offers a comprehensive financial solution for all transactions, incorporating tax integration, financial document creation & management, expense auditing, accounting, payments, and cost allocation functions. We utilize the latest machine learning technologies to create highly scalable, next-gen products that drive real-time financial accounting, reporting, and business insights.

This role will aid in the development of industry-leading financial system that supports the sustainable growth of the Amazon Transportation Network. We are seeking an analytical, technically proficient, innovative, hands-on, and customer-focused Business Analyst to join our dynamic, fast-paced team. The ideal candidate excels in a high-speed environment, enjoys working with large amounts of data, welcomes the challenge of highly complex business contexts, and is passionate about data and analytics. This role will play a critical part in helping our product, business, and tech team achieve their challenging objectives by providing focused and actionable insights.

Key job responsibilities

 Collaborate with stakeholders to anticipate their needs and facilitate business change Manage strategic projects involving partner teams such as BI teams and Customer teams Design, optimize, and compile queries for report generation in QuickSight, Tableau, and Excel Deliver key metrics, reports, and performance indicators, and solve ambiguous analyses and identify root causes Design and implement analytical models using statistical analysis Translate complex or ambiguous business problems into analysis requirements Understand the data required by the wider business for complex or comparative analysis Design, develop and deliver scalable tools for seamless data exploration and analytics for our internal stakeholders and understand customer interactions, improve the customer experience, and meet our goals Effectively communicate complex analytical insights and business implication

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Bellevue, WA, USA

Basic Qualifications

 5+ years of tax, finance or a related analytical field experience Bachelor's degree Experience defining requirements and using data and metrics to draw business insights Experience with SQL Experience making business recommendations and influencing stakeholders Design, develop and deliver scalable tools for seamless data exploration and analytics for our internal stakeholders and understand customer interactions, improve the customer experience, and meet our goals

Preferred Qualifications

 7+ years of tax, finance or a related analytical field experience Advanced technical degree (MS) Experience leading large-scale analytics projects with BI solutions development using AWS technologies –Redshift, Athena, S3, EC2, Quicksight etc. Proven success in designing and implementing ETL Pipelines, Query Performance Tuning, and other data engineering techniques Experience in scripting languages for parsing and data analysis e.g. Python or VBA Experience with Financial Reporting concepts 2+ year of experience with logistics or transportation business

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please visit https://www.amazon.jobs/en/disability/us.

Our compensation reflects the cost of labor across several US geographic markets. The base pay for this position ranges from $94,600/year in our lowest geographic market up to $185,000/year in our highest geographic market. Pay is based on a number of factors including market location and may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Amazon is a total compensation company. Dependent on the position offered, equity, sign-on payments, and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package, in addition to a full range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits. For more information, please visit https://www.aboutamazon.com/workplace/employee-benefits. This position will remain posted until filled. Applicants should apply via our internal or external career site.


Company - Amazon.com Services LLC

Job ID: A2592120

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
